beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “How can we reach them? The Hasran Imperium are the heirs to the Elentians. They have beaten us in every war. How will we reach their city without them even noticing?”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1083901
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “The headless knight is out there.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1084012
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “He’s got a bow made from the spine of a king, which also serves as a whip that can tear out a man’s soul.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1084242
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Sorry, Fionn. T-they found a headless body this morning.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1120281
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Couldn’t we take your griﬀin out?”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1120406
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue:
“I have to stay with the ship at all times. Mother was very speciﬁc. She doesn’t know I even brought it, and I’m not sure why I did. I’ve been afraid to use it all summer. My
--- Page 36 ---
primum is a lackey, and he’ll report everything back to her. Not much of a ﬁrst.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1120581
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1120679
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Linus the Minus.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1120923
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Go and fetch the primum. I want to hear this morning’s missive from Hasra.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1165064
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “If I am intruding, I will go. Was there any personal business you wished me to attend to after this morning’s session? You seemed…distracted.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1165323
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1224443
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Isn’t exactly kind,”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1224486
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “I agree. And I hate agreeing with you, urchin. Very well, then I will report to my mother. I will trust you in this, little dreadlord. It doesn’t mean I don't hate you. It doesn’t mean I won’t carve you up all year on the sands if they continue the academy and don’t simply send us oﬀ to war. But today we are allies with a common foe. Bring me my friend’s body, and I will see you well rewarded.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1270059
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Am I summoned?”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1270140
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “May I present Praetor Delinius, Highness, the commander of the oﬀensive against the Fomori.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1270234
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Come, Praetor.”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1270552
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “I have come to oﬀer grave news. Our legions have been decimated—”

Name: OPT_MQ3_Archive_1270619
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “So reduced by ten percent?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_790824
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Conceal Saghir from sight, so they believe he is still with me. Ashianna and Li, take Ephram and assault the enemy relic.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_791402
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “This plan is a lot better than mine. Attend, so they do not see which among us has the relic. Close your eyes, Xal, so even you do not know.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_860481
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Oh, you’ve arrived. At last! What ill timing. The bread will not finish baking for a while yet. And I so wanted to make a good impression on your friend. Hello! I am Kazon. You must be Saghir.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_943137
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Calm yourself.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_984235
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I stand with friend Xal, making two.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1014242
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You do not look well. Do your injuries require attention?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1086160
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I do possess the blessing of greater ﬁre. I am guessing you wish me to scry?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1088489
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Brilliant is what it is,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1313618
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “What are those?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1314840
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “We’re a net food exporter,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1351888
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Where does it all come from?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1352015
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1359855
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “This should be far enough I think,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1398264
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I am eager to be able to ﬂy if such things are possible.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1398323
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “When Ting decides we’re ready.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1442892
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You need to set an example for your people, Ashianna. What are the young warriors in your kingdom going to say when they hear you were afraid to take that step? Where will they ﬁnd their strength?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1555796
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I suppose I will have to adapt then.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1555939
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Where is she?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1555989
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “No idea, but the second she appears, I’m on her.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1560304
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1560321
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “He’s quite charming, I’m told.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1583855
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Our guests have arrived,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1583973
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “The time for pleasantries is at an end, and the time to discuss the future is upon us.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1613635
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Give me hope, Xal. Tell me you’re making out with her in some corner after training. You’re spending a lot of time together.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1633523
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “They wanted you to join them if you’re able. They’re also looking for Erik. Aren’t you his shadow?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1637869
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “This is delicious.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1647165
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Bring me back a cup of something hot to drink if you don’t mind.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1647232
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Urine is hot.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1647284
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “It’s warm, actually. And eww,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1647473
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I’m a ﬁre mage,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1694775
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “How does the tourney work?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1702750
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “That means get moving, Hasran.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1702783
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Don’t you dare call me that,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1702876
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I’m not a Hasran,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1739809
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “What are the other quints like?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1739998
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You’ve beaten Crispus on the sands? Truthfully, I thought I was assigned to you as a joke. I am not accounted a strong disciple, but neither am I weak. I assumed you at my level, especially from looking at your gear. That is good. It means others will underestimate us as well. I accounted us near the bottom third of all quints, but perhaps I am mistaken about that.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1806491
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “She’s probably invisible. Saghir, can you get into position to hit the amulet with ﬁre bolts? I’m betting she’s making for it.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1847821
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Combat breaks out at the oddest of times, though I suppose they were quite feisty in Calmora as well. Thankfully, I’ve learned to use air as Li does. I can cover my mug when not drinking so it won’t spill.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_62546
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I’ve been here since I woke up. No one has come in. I haven’t seen Tissa anywhere. Open the mirror, Xal. Now.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_64260
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Look at me, Xal. Witness what you have wrought. I was handsome.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_80651
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I don’t understand. Who is this Xal? And what are we meant to do? I won’t serve anyone. Not some demon prince.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_80909
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You know who. His presence is…intoxicating. He will have you agreeing to things before you realize it. But nothing I say will matter, not where Xal is concerned. Were I you, and were I seeking a return to the sun, I’d climb swiftly. The blood seed has made you stronger and faster, but such boons will fade. The levels above this one are feral and dangerous. Be swift and silent, lest you disturb the ghouls there. Feral demokin who recognize no master will devour their own limbs absent other prey.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_94926
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Save some for Tissa. She’ll be back.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_101865
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “But it’s helpful to understand everyone. Friends. Enemies. If you understand people’s motivations, then you can better predict their actions. What about Tissa? What happened to her?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_164289
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Nice work, Xal. Looks like you just earned yourself a promotion. Start moving our gear. Take the ten bunks closest to the door. We’ll keep everyone out until you’re done.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_167839
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Friend Xal, I have not thanked you for saving my life. If you had not intervened, I do not believe I would have survived the first hour. I…I am sad to admit that I am completely dependent upon you.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_220157
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I’m going to get some sleep. Saghir is going to keep watch, but if you can help him, that would be great. All you have to do is wake up Seth when the food is ready. Can you do that?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_354313
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I have heard many tales of the Celestial Mountain and the wonders there. It is a true honor to meet you, even had you not saved us. Since you have, then I owe water debt to you and to Xal. Thank you, Princess.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_369772
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “This is Saghir.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_380196
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I bet she gets that a lot. I saw how Darius and Erik fawned over her.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_387240
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Erik, didn’t you say something about new clothes?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_391972
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You’re falling asleep, friend Xal, and everyone is getting out.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_463486
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Ashianna, Gavius, this is Xal, and his little friend is Saghir. They’re joining our house. They’re in your year, too, Ashianna.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_492290
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Ashianna is going.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_501365
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Let’s stay together, friend Xal. We are stronger.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_522342
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Here is what we will do. We will pair our most advanced students with our least advanced. Each new student will receive a mentor, chosen at random. Let’s see…Darius with Xal.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_544943
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “After Xal’s grandfather was killed by our Imperator, his people were swept out with the rest of the trash?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_561700
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “And…I am so small. I cannot reach the Catalyst on my own. Once we enter the Reactor, if I fall off friend Xal or whoever I am with…then I will die in there.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_562254
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “They really put the fear in you. I am so glad I’m not in sixth year anymore. So Xal…I can’t help but notice that you’re poor and hungry. You like gold, right?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_587940
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Li…I don’t want to hurt you.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_589641
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Can you see to Saghir?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_604293
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Hey, Xal, you’re broke, right?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_614604
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Put up your staves! You’re going to be exposed to many hard facts over the next few weeks. You don’t have what it takes to beat Dalanthar, not yet. You’re lacking gear and skill, and teamwork. Unless you can build all three, get used to time in the medicus because Erik is going to use you as stress relief for the rest of the term.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_618703
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “And me?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_626326
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “If you’ll teach Saghir and me for the term, then the scale is yours.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_653428
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “The gutter rat found some armor, and so did Saghir. They’ve even found coin for lunch.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_686892
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Are we certain we wish to do this? These fights are to the death. This training is most unforgiving. One mistake. I am afraid, friend Xal.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_689911
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “And my familiar’s name is Saghir.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_717181
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I am called Emelia, and I will be your artificer this day, should need arise. I have been trained in the Temple of Tavren and completed my journeyman’s piece two summers ago. I am not yet a master, but am proficient in the greater path of artificing.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_731319
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “That will be useful in the Reactor, of course, but will also blunt Darius’s, Saghir’s, and Erik’s magic.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_731566
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Almost, I pity Xal,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_766011
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “It is my turn to save you, friend Xal.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_772019
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Elevating Saghir and Ephram isn’t fair. They did not secure victory alone. I battled three opponents, while the rest of you all battled but one.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_783446
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “On friend Xal.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_784390
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “All my coin is going on Xal. I have never seen a skilled player taken apart like this.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_790714
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Saghir goes with Ephram and uses his strength spells to enhance all of you.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_791082
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “They assume I have our relic and hunt me down. I lead them across the platforms, well away from you. They think Saghir and I are together and will send Erik to punish us. All I need do is delay them, and you win the match.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_906586
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I do not pretend to know all the advantages the nobility possess. I see them wear rings and amulets, but I do not understand the specific enchantments. Perhaps Ashianna or Li might know?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_914126
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I can, say, make myself stronger the way Saghir does with his spells?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_941972
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Xal is slippery,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_942919
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Come,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_944019
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Somehow he overheard that your mother ordered his death. He knows you’re going to try to kill him and stands ready to fight. The whole quint does. Ashianna and Li will stand with him if you try.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_944795
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “What of Li and Ashianna?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_944852
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I’m not even talking about the diplomatic incident in killing the heir to Calmora or the eldest daughter of the Praetor of Valys. These are people we know, Erik. Our friends, even if they’ve been saddled with demon-tainted quint-mates.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_969299
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Do you have a plan, friend Xal?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_984063
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Five on one, Xal. Kneel, and I will make your end quick.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_984481
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Have you no honor, Erik, that you would murder a fellow student in violation of your own law?”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_993100
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You’re always talking about what a tactical genius you are. So lead us over there and help us put Erik in his place. The bastard deserves it, and you know it. Besides, I want to show off for Li. I’ve never bedded a princess, and if she’s dating rats, that means I have a chance.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_995491
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Then you must take the Bond of Jhordil for me, the same as Vhala has done for Erik.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_997307
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Save Xal and I will become your concubine.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_998421
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You’ve coerced my brother into murder, and if word gets out, how do you think the Guild will take that? You’re risking my family name, Erik, and I don’t like that. It certainly would be a shame if you and Brutus and your pet companion all failed to return from a routine trip into an easy Catalyst, wouldn’t it? Your mother would need to squirt out some other mediocre would-be heir.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1009783
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Finish this, Erik,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1016188
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Xal…I’m so sorry.”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1022678
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You heard Saghir,”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1050597
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You’re not a demon! You’re Xal!”

Name: OPT_MQ4_Vault_1086239
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Can you?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3519545
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I am sorry, ratkin.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3537199
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “For the ﬁrst time, I feel worthy to hold you.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3537395
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3716028
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Make sure you come back in exactly one year if you can. We’re going to have a big festival with arena games ‘n meat ‘n ﬁsh ‘n stuﬀ. Please come!”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4305799
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “If Ephram of the Fomori says it is so, then it is so. I trust my fate to his words.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4597426
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “It was not I.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5048013
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5331906
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “What happened?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5331968
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “We’ve entered the underworld,”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5332033
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I didn’t think it would come this quickly.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5332078
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “How is this possible?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5418200
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “We are arriving now. I did not wish to interrupt.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5659176
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Granted. We know better than most the power of faith. And the second?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5659262
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Help and serve the Tree’s new protectors.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5949986
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Do you see another option, friend Frit?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5950158
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I am destined to wed the flame with the demonling. If that is true, then perhaps the prophecy means that I and my people stay here. We slow the demon march and buy you the time to reach the Heart. It will mean great sacrifice. We will lose much of our army. All of it if we stay and fight. But if it gets you to the Catalyst, then it will have been worth it.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_147179
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Erik, your friend has no interest in the games.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_414630
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I know you find me harsh, Erik.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_601071
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I promise I will not. I will help find out about this demon, and this prophecy, if that’s what you want. Promise me you’ll tell no one else though. Not until I’ve learned more. This could harm us. The Imperator hates demons and anything associated with your people. She’s mostly focused on Xal, but if you catch her notice, it will go badly. I can shield you, but you must move in shadow.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_653428
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “The gutter rat found some armor, and so did Saghir. They’ve even found coin for lunch.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_755756
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Friend Xal is right.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_756006
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “We’ll send Li to engage your untrained friends. You may not have faith in her to best prostrates, but I do.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_883494
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Good morning, friend Xal.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_999664
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue:
“I’d do it for you, Erik. Because pathetic mother’s boy that you are, you are still the monarch who will one day guide our Imperium. And if you begin your path to power by following the same misdeeds that led your mother here, then you will meet a similar fate. You
--- Page 551 ---
want to kill the urchin? Then kill him. No one will interfere. Or are you so frightened by the prospect of a duel?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1015011
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You did well in that duel. I was genuinely surprised to see a melee attack instead of a spell. I don’t think Erik saw such coming.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1024077
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Ephram’s words speak to my fate as well. My people were independent, once, but that was before my birth. We stood alone, proud, for many generations. Against orokh hordes, the consumed, and Olivanticus himself. Some people still remember being free, our oldest and strongest mages. Dwarves live a lot longer than humans, and earthen live even longer than that. Both are common slave races, a price we agreed to when we were adopted into the Imperium.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1130538
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Sir,”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1130660
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “We’ve taken signiﬁcant damage in that last volley. It seems the reactor is oﬄine, and we’re having trouble removing the spiders. Our Guild artiﬁcer set to work on repairs, but it will take time. As a precaution, I’d recommend we load you up on your griﬀin and send you skyward until the situation is—”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1481502
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Xal is a common name in the dims. I know another Xal and even one Legos. My name doesn’t mean anything beyond a random coincidence.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1510546
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “She assumed me to be your enemy and thought by spreading her legs she could manipulate me as she chooses. Did you know she faked a ritual? She cast an illusion of Brutus and pretended to dream his fate. She’s powerful, Li. Full illusionist. If you don’t ﬁnd a way to put her in check, then you will return after graduation to ﬁnd you’ve been deposed as heir.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1627158
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Friend Xal, would you be willing to escort me around the ship? I’d like to see whatever they are willing to show us. Perhaps even the reactor.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1728375
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue:
“She did not make a scabbard for Erik.
--- Page 424 ---
Or for anyone else. I think you may have a suitor. In our lands, such a gift means much.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1739998
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You’ve beaten Crispus on the sands? Truthfully, I thought I was assigned to you as a joke. I am not accounted a strong disciple, but neither am I weak. I assumed you at my level, especially from looking at your gear. That is good. It means others will underestimate us as well. I accounted us near the bottom third of all quints, but perhaps I am mistaken about that.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1982617
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Friend Xal is much more trusting than I,”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1987270
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Master Saghir,”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_1987904
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Thank you, friend Xal.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2141979
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Xal was right,”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2501089
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “After the vision of Shu, I don’t believe void is against our creator. I think it is a tool. Xal has shown us that. But my people will not understand.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2502519
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “See that all three survive and return to me. Do that, and then we are deﬁnitely even. No bad blood. Only friendship and mutual respect. It’s a small price. Not even a price at all really. You know that Tissa can lead them down there. She’s been. I know she knows the way, even if she won’t tell me what it is.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2609749
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue:
“Enough. I will not let you do this. I can stop it! I won’t let you ﬁght. I might not
--- Page 994 ---
be able to kill, but I can heal, and I can ward. Neither one of you is hurting the other. I’m sorry your stupid prophecy was a trick, but Xal is my friend. And he hasn’t done anything that he should be killed for, any more than you have. We can’t prejudge people and murder them because we read something in an old book. I won’t be a part of it.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2610298
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You and Ephram are friends? Ephram?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2612653
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I’d like that, Ephram.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2626907
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Everyone in the dims, Xal. From Panya to the babe Kez hasn’t found a name for yet.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2783249
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “A human named Xal. A man who saved my life many times, who the world needs to fulﬁll a great prophecy. I must prevent his death in the arena three days hence. I came to ask you, and your brother, if you can show me a way to do that. I have coin, and I know that patrons can help gladiators, but not the rules of such things.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2952062
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I have come to support Saghir.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_2954341
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I’ve seen no limitation. Xal has wielded the sword for over a year.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3350831
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Tissa is out there somewhere. Alone. Without either one of us to watch her back. I don’t have much left Xal, just a need to be with my sister. I helped you. Now you help me. Let’s be done with this prophecy nonsense. What’s to stop you from marching out of the desert right now? Your rat could ﬂy—”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3351162
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “has his own opinions. I could ﬂy Xal elsewhere if I thought that’s where he needed to be. But my friend has conﬁded in me that his ﬁrst tomb lies somewhere within these sands. And I am going to help him ﬁnd it and help him fulﬁll the prophecy you just heard related to the druid. And if you get in the way…well you are just a sword, aren’t you?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3351653
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I don’t know when I’ll ﬁnd Tissa.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3353783
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Good morning, hand of fate. Friend Xal has asked a valid question. How might we journey into the desert? I can simply carry all of us. I can even cloak us from sight so that natural predators do not see us. I can also protect you from the heat, though I doubt anyone will need such.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3388673
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You do not think my presence will prevent you from reaching the impossible city, do you, friend Xal?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3389550
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Gakk think Xal right.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3498362
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “To return to Tissa. I think she’s in Hasra. Might be in Enestius now.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3551073
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I forget that you have a quick wit, friend Xal. And that you forgive easily. I still bear some responsibility. But it eases me that you are not troubled.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3564479
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I have long studied you, friend Xal.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3665303
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Saghir, Isharah is right. We don’t have time for this. Carry the rest of them to the palace. All of them. Go. Now.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3665420
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I cannot leave you here alone, friend Xal.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3714543
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I feel that friend Xal’s fate will bring him here once more, and I will be at his side when it does. In the meantime, if you or the hand of fate ever require our aid, then send a missive. We can cross the world as fast as an airship if need be and will come if we are able.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3715993
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Oh!”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3843177
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I wish I could take you with me, but I don’t think we’d be very popular in Olivantia. And I’ll be back before you know it, hopefully to stay. Saghir can fly us to Olivantia and back in a couple weeks.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_3977317
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Why not have Saghir fly us to the Skull right now and simply take what I’m after?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4259631
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue:
“What will I become after the fourth
--- Page 334 ---
tomb? How much of me, Xal, the kid from the dims, will remain? What will I be expected to do? I am so mired in prophecy that I feel like every footstep has been planned.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4384789
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “The people will already follow you, but this will make it a lot more personal. What do we do after, though? If Hasra really is going to war…that’s our friends. I mean some of us, anyway. What do you intend to do, Xal?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4389580
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Well, it might be a good thing with Tissa.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4435422
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Saghir, can you teleport us down to the lake of blood?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4460668
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I can’t ask Li to watch her nation and her people burn. I can’t destroy the Blasted Lands and all the children who live there. I can’t destroy every forest, and river, and spirit, and book, and airship. Not even to free her.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4544042
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You executed her, and next you were going to try to kill me. Your friends have already paid the price. They are very dead, I assure you. Now here’s what you are going to do. You’re going to scurry back to Totarius, or Erik, or whoever is in charge. You are going to tell them that I will trade his son for my husband. The body is preserved and can be resurrected. As can the companion. I will perform the spell myself if my husband is brought back to me. Now go, assassin, before I decide to vent my rage and deliver the message myself.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4674495
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “The Hand of Xal?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4728725
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You know our capabilities. I was going to have Xenia and Doxia open portals and disgorge the forces they have prepared. I will add my own portal, with the forces you remember from the capital. Fates willing, that will delay their forces long enough to kill the tree. I think we need to assault it with direct sorcery, the strongest spells we can use. Saghir, Temis, and I will all assail it directly. I will use my vessel’s spellcannon. They may use whatever means they possess.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4739605
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Xal broke it. My friend. My enemy? I don’t know. It’s all jumbled between us. I think it’s my fault. Or maybe Nef’s. Or that damned school tearing us apart.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4769069
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Temis and I plotted together to achieve this. We were fortunate Xal was exactly who prophecy has made out him to be. Pity we did not kill the vithi, but certainly the damage we inflicted will convince the tree that the dreadlords are a greater threat. We have bought the knights time, and I hope Ilsa uses it wisely. With that, my dear, I am ending the spell.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_4988308
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “This stuff is awful. Just awful. I do not believe magic can free me, yet Xal’s abilities won’t be any help either.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5418134
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Apologies,”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5443796
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “The best thing I can do is be a part of what’s going on in Olivantia. I intend to support Xal there and to rebuild my religion. Come or don’t, as you will. But remember this. If you choose wrong,”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5500517
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Your mistake is understandable. Xal has been poisoned by our enemy. Reevanthara has tainted him with a soul whose very aspect is the weakness you seek to shed. Had that not occurred, then you and he may have bested me. It seems the fates conspire to aid me, proving my cause is just.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5549854
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Like working with Ducius?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5550068
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You’d embrace that serpent? You’d condone what he’s done? Then how are we better? We misuse some so that others might be spared? It’s no different than Xal. No different than Desidria.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5688146
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I am Xal and you know me. Some of you hate me. Some of you revere me, and I thank you for that faith. My sister took the Hammer. I now return it, and with the aid of the Steward of Justice hope to restore it to your fine city. Then I will depart to continue fighting Totarius and his hordes for the fate of the entire cycle.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5728527
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Xal has fared well, but his sister is using magic he’s struggled to counter. He’s recovered the spear Worldender and is about to engage her for the final time. For good or ill, I suspect we’re about to see the end of the fight that will determine all our fates.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5832990
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “If you stand with Xa, then you stand against Xal, and the time has come to pay the price for that choice. I will slaughter all who oppose me. Join me and live. Together we will forge a new future for demonkind. Or be ground under my heel and forgotten by time.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5915081
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Has Saghir explained what we’re doing?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_5950122
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Sacrifice.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_53083
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “If you drink, you might die. You’ll definitely become more like the demokith. Maybe grow a tail. It’s a high price. I’m not touching it.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_81876
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue:
“I aid you because Xalegos will free us all with his return, and I would see the sunlight once more. But that is not the only reason. I crave an avatar, little demon girl. One who is as I was. A lone woman in this world bereft of means, or purpose, or family she could trust. Use the power I have given you. Claim your birthright and your destiny.
--- Page 44 ---
Aid Xal in his rise. And when the day comes…pray to me, and I will answer.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_147332
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Take her and go learn her slave’s fate.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_156825
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “A sad fate, but not one I foresee escaping.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_161377
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “We cannot control our fates.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_414423
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Because the magic will twist you, Highness. It will shape you into the very demons it was drawn from. It is powerful, yes, but power always bears a price. Remember that or all of us may one day pay yours.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_477413
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “So I’m part of some sort of prophecy?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_480209
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “If you do not, then your family pays the price, as I said.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_600567
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue:
“Help me learn about the demon. If I give you a name…I need to know if what she said is true. Is it really possible for there to be a prophecy about
--- Page 332 ---
someone destroying the world?”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_634400
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Tomorrow, you will pay a price for this.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_641738
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “This is the mark of Tavren, which you probably know from your school up on the hill. It means I care about making and less about selling. I won’t try to cheat you. Fair price for fair steel.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_706833
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Our fates rest upon you,”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_755594
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You’ve never completed a single tactics course. You know nothing of war. Do as I command, or we will all pay the price. Now is not the time to debate strategy.”

Name: OPT_MQ5_Prophecy_819367
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Do not speak. Just listen. I must be brief. We cannot be seen together, or you will pay the ultimate price. You are fully healed?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_749927
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Everyone in the school must be here, not merely students.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_790370
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Will you hear it or go with Ashianna’s?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_790824
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Conceal Saghir from sight, so they believe he is still with me. Ashianna and Li, take Ephram and assault the enemy relic.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_806939
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “We’ve seen how quickly he went down. Brutus and Darius crave vengeance, and I will see that they have it. If Li or Ashianna intervene, they can do nothing to save Xal, as they are no healers.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_885020
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “So how is the tourney structured? And how are we graded?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_885163
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “They’ll gather us all in one of the largest classrooms,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_906586
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I do not pretend to know all the advantages the nobility possess. I see them wear rings and amulets, but I do not understand the specific enchantments. Perhaps Ashianna or Li might know?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_944019
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Somehow he overheard that your mother ordered his death. He knows you’re going to try to kill him and stands ready to fight. The whole quint does. Ashianna and Li will stand with him if you try.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_944795
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “What of Li and Ashianna?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_961466
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_961666
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I don’t think he’s going to make it,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_961720
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “or if he does, it will be well after the rest of us.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_984858
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “She’s ordered this, Li. Would you stand in defiance of the Imperator’s will?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_988541
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Flank the urchin on the right. I will take the left. Darius, keep hitting him with spells until this baby dreadlord stops moving. Vhala, keep Li and Ashianna off of us until my blade finds his heart.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1025831
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “It’s time to get ready for the ceremony. We need to look presentable, even you, Ashianna.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1119505
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “You are certain this is not some paranoia? Has the mist truly unnerved you? If there is a real threat, then perhaps you can persuade Erik to order the vessel into the sky.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1316811
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Those words are treason,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1316973
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “You should take care, prince. Your royal mother might hear. I imagine it would be terribly inconvenient to groom another heir. Seems like a lot of eﬀort.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1441848
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I, ah, have a tremendous fear of heights. If I close my eyes and sit upon your shoulder will you jump for both of us?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1441968
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1441985
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “No pressure, right?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1442892
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “You need to set an example for your people, Ashianna. What are the young warriors in your kingdom going to say when they hear you were afraid to take that step? Where will they ﬁnd their strength?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1459899
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Oh, mighty general of the celestial host, how you have fallen.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1616513
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1616530
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “May I make a suggestion, my friends?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1616632
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I mean…if we wish to achieve victory upon the sands.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1637869
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “This is delicious.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1647165
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Bring me back a cup of something hot to drink if you don’t mind.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1647232
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Urine is hot.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1647284
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “It’s warm, actually. And eww,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1647397
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1647473
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I’m a ﬁre mage,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1670332
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “And even with Li and Ashianna in your quint…you’re going to get stomped. I won’t fall for your tricks this year.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1694775
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “How does the tourney work?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1698787
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Report to Prince Erik. You will obey his orders for the term, and your marks will reﬂect your quint’s performance.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1699314
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Report to Princess Li. You will follow her order—”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1708296
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Yeah. I like birds in general, but I think ravens are my favorite.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1739708
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1739809
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “What are the other quints like?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1743414
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue:
“I’ve got some gold I can
--- Page 434 ---
contribute to paying the tutor, especially if they’re cheap.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1743590
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I will retreat to the pack for now. I’m going to start a ﬁre and put on some tea.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1810734
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Pick up Ashianna with your tendrils and get her onto the pillar.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1845351
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I could use some pork. I know that Ashianna says she’s getting tired of bacon, but I could dine forever on nothing else.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1849664
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Plenty of room. I thought you’d gone oﬀ to train with Ashianna.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1849933
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Friend Ashianna likes you. I believe she’s hoping that you might kiss her or at least ﬂatter her, as many others here have done.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1850428
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “That was an incredible dodge. We need to get you on the melee front line with Ashianna.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1853702
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “There’s Ashianna!”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1854005
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “The schedule’s been posted,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1864597
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Ashianna, take point and start jogging toward the left. Standing still isn’t going to do anything positive for us. Move at a run. Force them to stay on the move. And if you have ﬂight, use it.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1902770
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I’m still stuck on the arena match. On Crispus. Ashianna, if I’m understanding correctly, if you were to bear the brunt of their oﬀensive, you could keep going indeﬁnitely, as long as we don’t let them focus you down?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1906851
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1906868
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “He’d be at the head of the ﬂeet to help you, I agree.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1913201
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Something like what?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1913383
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I have to go meet Crispus. May the best quint win.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1913493
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Luck to you as well, sneaky deadly girl!”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1943197
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Spinerippers,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_1943247
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “What did you call them?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2034261
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Why did the sands not conﬁgure themselves?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2054701
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “It means that Ashianna’s people can’t aﬀord to send an airship to pick us up. We’ll be ﬂying to Valys on griﬀinback.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2055448
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “The swiftest griﬀin can cover thirty leagues in a bell,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2088424
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2088441
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “It does and more.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2088760
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “He sounds impressive.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2089330
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “You’ll love Ducius, trust me.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2098540
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Ho, ho, looks like some of Morog’s people!”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2099043
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Where are they going?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2099145
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “To the rough market,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2107364
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I’m sure an opportunity will present itself.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2107734
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I thought you’d never arrive.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2109375
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I see Li is on her way to meet Ducius,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2113241
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I do not know if I have ever seen such skill,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2129508
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Are you suggesting I am not the best at my chosen ﬁeld?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2133632
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Take note, Ducius. That is a warrior. There are many kinds of strength. I have taught you mine. Your brother favors Etrian’s. I suppose we will see which is more eﬀective in the long run.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2149128
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I know friend Ashianna disparaged her homeland’s food, but I feel I have died and gone to the impossible city. This is heavenly!”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2155536
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “That was exhilarating.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2155616
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “The griﬀins are so fast, especially during a dive.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2155669
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I can imagine the use against Fomori,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2157811
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I don’t like Hasrans. Ducius, you know that. But I reserve a special hatred for your father. If you think I’d elevate either one of you, then you’re as deﬁcient as your brother’s mother.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2160167
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Guess you are legatus this time,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2160414
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2191227
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2191244
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “This is my favorite segment of the journey so far,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2196159
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “You’ve got my attention. Who’s your friend, Ashianna?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2196636
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2196730
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Are you a real blademaster, friend Soﬁa?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2196844
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “What does that mean, exactly? When does one gain the title? Is there some sort of certiﬁcate or ceremony?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2196952
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “There’s a test when you reach the ﬁfth rank. You duel a master, and they decide if you are ready,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2199822
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Does that make you and friend Ashianna cousins?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2229442
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “What are they?”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2229631
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “They’re growing dwarves from primals captured in the underground caverns beneath the city.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2251488
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Ashianna, that’s perfect. Well done!”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2267139
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “You’ve taught us nothing,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2267265
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “If you learned nothing,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2267318
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “then maybe I’ll get lucky and you’ll die for want of training.”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2267383
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I’m not going to war, you imbecile,”

Name: OPT_MQ6_Confront_2274503
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “You’re going to make me a bundle, Xal, especially when you take Ducius in the ﬁnals.”
